title: Title
type-and-press-enter-to-confirm: Type and press enter to confirm
builder-sidebar-hint: Move items by Drag & drop items to your form to build an evaluation form template
changes-you-apply-msg: Changes you apply here will affect all sections and fields in this form
weight-scoring-section-msg: When is active you can set the percentage priority for each section and each block inside, so the overall rating will be calculated taking into account your priorities and weight of each unit.
dynamic-val-msg: Turn on if you want to show real values from the candidate profile as options for evaluations
all-q-at-once-description: This is a default option, assigned member will see all the questions at once with a single Submit button
type-form-description: Collect answers one by one, members will see one question per slide with the Previous/Next buttons
default-scoring-msg: To improve your hiring process, build a strong employer brand to help you attract strong candidates without much recruiting.

add-rating-to-control: Add Rating blocks to control them
please-enter-correct-weights: Please make sure that the total weight of the sections equals 100, and the total weight of the blocks inside the section equals the weight of the section
you-wont-be-able-to-revert-this: You won't be able to revert this
start-adding-data-section: Start adding data section from your templates or create a document sections from scratch.
click-on-add-section: Click on add section then drag and drop items from side bar to build or update scorecard template
